verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seal <S%G4973><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Seventh, <S%G1442><s%> Was <S%G1096><s%> Silence <S%G4602><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> About <S%G5613><s%> Half An Hour. <S%G2256><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Angels, <S%G32><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Stand, <S%G2476><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Given <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Trumpets. <S%G4536><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Alter, <S%G2379><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Censor <S%G3031><s%> Golden; <S%G5552><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Incense <S%G2368><s%> Much, <S%G4183><s%> That He <S%G2443><s%> Might Give It <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Prayers <S%G4335><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Altar <S%G2379><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Golden <S%G5552><s%> Which Was <S%G3588><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne. <S%G2362><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Up <S%G305><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Incense <S%G2368><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Prayers <S%G4335><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Censer, <S%G3031><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Filled <S%G1072><s%> It <S%G846><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Alter, <S%G2379><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> It Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth : <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Were <S%G1096><s%> Voices, <S%G5456><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thunders, <S%G1027><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lightnings, <S%G796><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> An Earthquake. <S%G4578><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Trumpets <S%G4536><s%> Prepared <S%G2090><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> That They <S%G2443><s%> Might Sound Their Trumpets. <S%G4537><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Sounded His Trumpet; <S%G4537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> Hail <S%G5464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> Mingled <S%G3396><s%> With Blood, <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Cast <S%G906><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth : <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Trees <S%G1186><s%> Was Burnt Up, <S%G2618><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Grass <S%G5528><s%> Green <S%G5515><s%> Was Burnt Up. <S%G2618><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Sounded His Trumpet; <S%G4537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As It Were <S%G5613><s%> A Mountain <S%G3735><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> With Fire <S%G4442><s%> Burning <S%G2545><s%> Was Cast <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> Blood; <S%G129><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Creatures <S%G2938><s%> Which Were <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Life; <S%G5590><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ships <S%G4143><s%> Was Destroyed. <S%G1311><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Sounded His Trumpet; <S%G4537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> A Star <S%G792><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Burning <S%G2545><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Lamp, <S%G2985><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Rivers, <S%G4215><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fountains <S%G4077><s%> Of Waters. <S%G5204><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Star <S%G792><s%> Is Called <S%G3004><s%> Wormwood; <S%G894><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Becomes <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Wormwood, <S%G894><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waters, <S%G5204><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They Were Made Bitter. <S%G4087><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fourth <S%G5067><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Sounded His Trumpet; <S%G4537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Smitten <S%G4141><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sun, <S%G2246><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Moon, <S%G4582><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Stars; <S%G792><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Should Be Darkened <S%G4654><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Should Appear For <S%G5316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of It, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> Likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Flying <S%G4072><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Mid Heaven, <S%G3321><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Dwell <S%G2730><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Remaining <S%G3062><s%> Voices <S%G5456><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Trumpet <S%G4536><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Who Are <S%G3588><s%> About <S%G3195><s%> To Sound Their Trumpets. <S%G4537><s%>
